failed" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="7oz8o1kR7rJrasYNseNM-30"> <mxGeometry x="-0.2492" y="-1" relative="1" <mxGeometry x="280" y="360" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7oz8o1kR7rJrasYNseNM-17" value="create message in DB with status 'created'" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="280" y="470" width="120" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7oz8o1kR7rJrasYNseNM-26" target="7oz8o1kR7rJrasYNseNM-12"> <mxGeometry relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint x="185" y="280" as="targetPoint" /> <Array as="points"> <mxPoint x="180" y="270" /> </Array> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7oz8o1kR7rJrasYNseNM-28" value="topics: delivered or failed" style="edgeLabel;html=1;align=center;verticalAlign=middle;resizable=0;points=[];" vertex="1" connectable="0" parent="7oz8o1kR7rJrasYNseNM-26"> <mxGeometry x="-0.2462" relative="1" as="geometry"> <mxPoint as="offset" /> </mxGeometry> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7oz8o1kR7rJrasYNseNM-20" value="every N minutes, a worker retrieves messages with a 'created' status from the DB and then sends messages to clients." style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="90" y="470" width="170" height="80" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> <mxCell id="7oz8o1kR7rJrasYNseNM-29" value="update message status to 'delivered' or 'failed'" style="rounded=0;whiteSpace=wrap;html=1;" vertex="1" parent="1"> <mxGeometry x="550" y="360" width="130" height="60" as="geometry" /> </mxCell> </root> </mxGraphModel> </diagram> </mxfile>
